data.actual_result: VoiceOver detects the elements behind the settings menu, and will select and read them off.
data.expected_result: VoiceOver only selects elements on the Settings menu
data.short_description: VoiceOver detects elements behind the settings menu
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your iPhone settings and enable VoiceOver - Go into Discord - Open settings while in a server with channels - Touch down on the location where a channel was
